div.class: vc_separator wpb_content_element vc_sep_width_100 vc_sep_border_width_2 vc_sep_pos_align_center type_1

li.a: Plattsburgh City School District Complaint Procedures

div.p: The Plattsburgh City School District, located on beautiful Lake Champlain in upstate New York, serves 2,000 students in 5 schools. Our highly qualified and experienced faculty provides a state of the art education that fully integrates technology with traditional face-to-face teaching methods.
Our high school, middle school and three elementary school buildings are centers of community activities such as athletics, the arts and after school programs –and that is just the “A” list!

img.title: This link will open in a new tab.
img.alt: This link will open in a new tab.

p.img: is an excellent place to live, work and raise a family, with a growing presence in the aerospace industry, as evidenced by the rapidly expanding Plattsburgh International Airport . Built on the former Plattsburgh Air Force Base, the airport shows the area’s commitment to both education and hi-tech jobs.

div.p: We are proud of our students, faculty and school facilities, so please, dig deeper into our website and see why we believe we are the best choice in the North Country for both excellence in education and quality of life.

Students will be given credit for courses ending in an exam and will not need to take the exam at a later date as long as they are passing the course […]

div.div:
Are you having a technology issue at home? Please Click Here to Report an Issue and someone will be in touch with you shortly.
To contact tech support during school hours (Mon - Fri from 8a to 3p) by phone - please call 518-957-6023 and you may leave a message.
